subject: College Athletics
Football
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Connecticut’s defense played well enough to keep the Huskies within striking distance of North Carolina State, but the offense did little in the team’s 10-7 loss to the visiting Wolfpack.
snippet: Connecticut’s defense played well enough to keep the Huskies within striking distance of North Carolina State, but the offense did little in the team’s 10-7 loss to the visiting Wolfpack.
